import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../assets/component.css"; class Quiz extends Component { state = { quote: null, available: true, question: 0, count: 0, a: null, b: null, c: null, d: null, qna: [ [ "What is a correct syntax to output 'Hello World' in Python?", "print('Hello World')", "p('Hello World')", "pr('Hello World')", "System.out.println('Hello World')" ], [ "How do you insert a comment in Python?", "#Comment", "//Comment", "/* Comment */", "&Comment" ], [ "How can we distinguish blocks of code in Python?", "By indentation", "By a semicolon at the end of each line", "By a comma at the end of each line", "The editor will figure out" ] ] }; handleCorrect = () => { const count = [...this.state.count]; count.value++; this.setState({ count }); }; render() { return (

{this.state.quote}

); } } export default Quiz;
